justification: Understands Team B values deep-threat WRs, but misses their injury aversion and need for RB stability—trading away Brian Harris leaves B reliant on a Questionable Liam Green. Perspective-taking is present but shallow; rationale is generic and ignores consensus-trusting tendencies and roster balance. Trade is plausible, but not well-aligned with B’s incentives; acceptance probability seems overly optimistic.
